content: stay warm in handmade style with this double thick tunisian crochet ear warmer this pattern uses the beautiful tunisian knit stitch to create that classic knit-look texture the updated design now includes four sizes 2 child and 2 women s so you can make a matching set for for you and your mini the pattern is easy to follow with clear step-by-step instructions that guide you through from start to finish perfect for chilly walks last-minute gifts or cozy market makes this ear warmer works up quickly and looks effortlessly polished **this pattern has been tested ** ***this tunisian crochet pattern includes two finishing options one creates a simple band the other creates the knot/twist finish **sizes** this pattern is written to incorporate 4 sizes women and child s headwrap wider band and woman and child s ear warmer narrower band it also includes instructions on how to customize the band width and circumference **skill level** easy **recommended yarn** 159-369 yards size 4 yarn depending on size lion brand jeans yarn used in designer s sample **hook** 6 5 mm tunisian crochet hook with 4-in long cord **notions** yarn needles scissors **gauge** 16 sts x 18 row = 4 inches x 4 inches worked in tks **finished dimensions** women s 21 inches around and 6 inches wide headwrap 4 inches wide ear warmer child s 18 inches around and 4 inches wide headwrap 3 inches wide ear warmer **terms to know** chain slip_stitch tunisian knit stitch tks tunisian return pass
